languages.text: "Под музыку орудий рождаются лишь кровавые и короткие песни. Ты думаешь, что сможешь заставить..." {n}Свист пули, пролетевшей над ухом Пощады, заставляет его захлебнуться собственным красноречием.{/n}

"Only short and bloody songs are born to the sound of weaponfire. You think you can force—" {n}The whistle of the bullet that flies just past Mercy's ear makes him swallow the rest of his florid speech.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Под музыку орудий рождаются лишь кровавые и короткие песни. Ты думаешь, что сможешь заставить..." {n}Свист пули, пролетевшей над ухом Пощады, заставляет его захлебнуться собственным красноречием.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Only short and bloody songs are born to the sound of weaponfire. You think you can force—" {n}The whistle of the bullet that flies just past Mercy's ear makes him swallow the rest of his florid speech.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: “枪炮只会发出短暂而血腥的歌声，你真的以为你能强迫——”{n}子弹飞过悯慈耳边，他不得不把剩下的花言巧语都咽了回去。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Only short and bloody songs are born to the sound of weaponfire. You think you can force—" {n}The whistle of the bullet that flies just past Mercy's ear makes him swallow the rest of his florid speech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “枪炮只会发出短暂而血腥的歌声，你真的以为你能强迫——”{n}子弹飞过悯慈耳边，他不得不把剩下的花言巧语都咽了回去。{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: 「銃声の中で生まれるのは、短くて血なまぐさい歌だけだ。無理強いできると思っているのならば―」{n}マーシーの耳をかすめた弾丸の汽笛が、彼の華麗なスピーチの残りを飲み込ませた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Only short and bloody songs are born to the sound of weaponfire. You think you can force—" {n}The whistle of the bullet that flies just past Mercy's ear makes him swallow the rest of his florid speech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「銃声の中で生まれるのは、短くて血なまぐさい歌だけだ。無理強いできると思っているのならば―」{n}マーシーの耳をかすめた弾丸の汽笛が、彼の華麗なスピーチの残りを飲み込ませた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: «De una ráfaga de balas solo pueden nacen canciones breves y sangrientas. Crees que puedes...». {n}El silbido de la bala que roza el oído de Mercy le hace tragarse el resto de su florido discurso.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Only short and bloody songs are born to the sound of weaponfire. You think you can force—" {n}The whistle of the bullet that flies just past Mercy's ear makes him swallow the rest of his florid speech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «De una ráfaga de balas solo pueden nacen canciones breves y sangrientas. Crees que puedes...». {n}El silbido de la bala que roza el oído de Mercy le hace tragarse el resto de su florido discurso.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: « Les chansons sont toujours brèves et sanglantes au son des canons. Tu penses pouvoir m'obliger... » {n}Le sifflement de la balle qui frôle l'oreille de Mercy lui fait avaler le reste de son discours.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Only short and bloody songs are born to the sound of weaponfire. You think you can force—" {n}The whistle of the bullet that flies just past Mercy's ear makes him swallow the rest of his florid speech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les chansons sont toujours brèves et sanglantes au son des canons. Tu penses pouvoir m'obliger... » {n}Le sifflement de la balle qui frôle l'oreille de Mercy lui fait avaler le reste de son discours.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: "Der Klang von Waffenfeuer erschafft nur kurze und blutige Lieder. Glaubt Ihr, Ihr könnt mich dazu zwing..." {n}Die Kugel, die haarscharf an Mercys Ohr vorbeipfeift, lässt ihn während seiner blumigen Rede verstummen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Only short and bloody songs are born to the sound of weaponfire. You think you can force—" {n}The whistle of the bullet that flies just past Mercy's ear makes him swallow the rest of his florid speech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der Klang von Waffenfeuer erschafft nur kurze und blutige Lieder. Glaubt Ihr, Ihr könnt mich dazu zwing..." {n}Die Kugel, die haarscharf an Mercys Ohr vorbeipfeift, lässt ihn während seiner blumigen Rede verstummen.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: "Silahların ateşlenme sesinden yalnızca kısa ve kanlı şarkılar doğar. Bana zorla..." {n}Kulağının hemen yanından geçen kurşunun ıslığı, Merhamet'in cafcaflı konuşmasının geri kalanının boğazında kalmasına sebep oluyor.{/n}
